    • Method Detail

      • reverseFile

        public static void reverseFile(java.util.Scanner fin)
        This method reverses the contents of the file recursively It does not return a value instead it prints the contents of the file reversed. The method checks for a nextLine. If there is a nextLine it is read from the file and stored and reverseFile is called again. When the entire file has been read the results are printed out This occurs after the final call to reverseFile
        Parameters:
        fin - The scanner Object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if fin is NULL

      • doBoth

        public static void doBoth(java.util.Scanner fin)
        This method does both reversing the file and reversing the line The method checks for a nextLine. If there is a nextLine it is read from the file and stored and doBoth is called again. At the end of the file the stored String is passed to reverseString
        Parameters:
        fin - The file object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if fin is NULL

      • reverseString

        public static java.lang.String reverseString(java.lang.String str)
        This method reverses the passed in string recursively
        Parameters:
        str - The string to be reversed
        Returns:
        The reversed String
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if str is null

      • menu

        public static int menu(java.util.Scanner kb)
        Valid menu choice
        1) reverse the string
        2) reverse the file
        3) do both
        4) quit
        Parameters:
        kb - the scanner object
        Returns:
        the menu choice you must guarantee it will be between 1 and 4
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if kb is null

      • readString

        public static java.lang.String readString(java.util.Scanner kb)
        Reads a string from the keyboard
        Parameters:
        kb - The Scanner object to the keyboard
        Returns:
        A string that you will guarantee is not empty
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if kb is null
